content:
<table-wrap id="tblI" orientation="portrait" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>Summary of Single-Crystal X-ray Data
for ZIFs Collected at Variable Temperature</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup align="left" cols="5">

</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>

<sup>1</sup>H and <sup>13</sup>C NMR Spin–Lattice Relaxation Times for ZIF-8<xref rid="tIIfn1"></xref> carbon resonance position sample 150.5 ppm 123.5 ppm 13.3 ppm ZIF-8 in air 1H 0.50 ± 0.06 0.56 ± 0.06 0.50 ± 0.06 13C 16.6 ± 2 10.4 ± 1.5 6.8 ± 0.7 ZIF-8 in N2 1H 12.4 ± 1.5 10.9 ± 1.2 14.8 ± 1.6 13C 357 ± 40 702 ± 70 28.4 ± 30

Spin–lattice relaxation times are given in seconds.

1H spin–lattice relaxation times measured indirectly through 13C CP/MAS experiments.
clean_text:
Table 2. 1H and 13C NMR Spin–Lattice Relaxation Times for ZIF-8[^a]

| sample        | carbon resonance position | 150.5 ppm | 123.5 ppm | 13.3 ppm |
|---------------|----------------------------|-----------|-----------|----------|
| ZIF-8 in air  | 1H[^b]                     | 0.50 ± 0.06 | 0.56 ± 0.06 | 0.50 ± 0.06 |
|               | 13C                        | 16.6 ± 2 | 10.4 ± 1.5 | 6.8 ± 0.7 |
| ZIF-8 in N2   | 1H[^b]                     | 12.4 ± 1.5 | 10.9 ± 1.2 | 14.8 ± 1.6 |
|               | 13C                        | 357 ± 40 | 702 ± 70 | 28.4 ± 30 |

[^a]: Spin–lattice relaxation times are given in seconds.
[^b]: 1H spin–lattice relaxation times measured indirectly through 13C CP/MAS experiments.
